Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to application of disability retirement benefits for certain participants in World Trade Center rescue, recovery, or cleanup operations
Summary: Expands the application of disability retirement benefits for certain participants in World Trade Center rescue, recovery, or cleanup operations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 252 of the laws of 2019 amending the retirement and social security law relating to disability retirement benefits for certain participants in World Trade Center rescue, recovery, or cleanup operations, in relation to the application of such provisions
